News

In the coming week, the people of the region will feel respiratory springs.

On the night of Monday, 26 February, the Penzen region is expected to freeze to -16 degrees. There's no gardening. Breaks of the southern wind 7-12 m/s.

Schools will study family history

Study of family history will be part of the cycle of extracurricular activities " Talks about important " in the next academic year.
25.02.2024

In the Sahrawi region, two people were killed in a fire


On the night of Sunday, 25 February, there was a fire in the Savings District that took two lives.
25.02.2024

The hopes of penzens to see a high guest from Africa have not been met.


In Penza, the question arose as to whether there would be a voir with a giraffe in the zoo. It turns out that as long as the exotic animal of the peas and the guests of the regional center will not see.
25.02.2024

A number of Russians were reminded of the increase in pensions since 1 March


G. V. Plejanova Yulia Finogenov, Professor of State and Municipal Finance of the REU, in an interview with Praim, reminded a number of Russians to raise pensions on 1 March.
25.02.2024

The cardiologist pointed to an unusual symptom of oxygen hunger.


Chronic oxygen starvation in a man says an unusual symptom, told Anna Korenevich's cardiologist.
25.02.2024

There's no place in Belinsky to symbolize the city.


The resident of Belinsky Alexander S. tried to find out the fate of the four-metre greyef V. G. Belinski. A man was expecting a decent place in town.
25.02.2024

Russia warned of a new type of apartment fraud.


The villains are developing new ways to take housing from the Russians. The Director General of the Real Estate Agency, Anatoly Pysin, warned about new types of apartment fraud.
25.02.2024

The Penns will provide assistance on the instructions of the E.R.


In the Ministry of Health, the Russian Federation is changing the order of first aid. The draft order has already been drafted.
25.02.2024

The roof of the stop pavilion to the ground. Caracosov misses the snow.


The roof of the stop pavilion on the Karacosov street in Penza failed to survive. There was a huge hole in it.
25.02.2024

Rapsy traces were found at the border of two districts of the Penzen region


In the Penza region, traces of the risey were found in another place. This was the case in the region ' s hunting grounds.
25.02.2024

Rossian's country was affected by a lethal fever. One Russian has already died, the virus continues to spread.


The Russian recreational refrigerator was infected with the dengue fever after the bite of the mosquito in Sri Lanka and was unable to survive. Telegram-canal Mash reports.
25.02.2024

Agronomy solved the way to get more crops from one stream.


The Specialist explained that if I grew up until 10 May and placed it under temporary caption, the first booth could be obtained by 15 June.
25.02.2024

The analysts warned about the cost of the bouquet by 8 March


On the eve of 8 March, the cost of flowers has traditionally increased as the demand for them increases. According to experts, the bouquets are purchased 20 to 25 times more frequently than in February.
25.02.2024

The famous white boy was evacuated to Penzu


Aleša Pavlichenko, a resident of the Belgorod region, who became known in Russia after a video of his meeting of a Russian military convoy heading to the SVR area and giving her the honour, is now living in the Penza camp.
25.02.2024

The penis lost 50,000 roubles after receipt of the discount bill.


A 55-year-old Penza woman believed an e-mail with a discount coupon for domestic equipment and lost a significant amount.
25.02.2024

The Penns promised a very fragile spring.


The wires, including the Penza region, will cost a warm Atlantic cyclone, so the beginning of the calendar spring in the Sur region will be cold. Thermometer may show up to -10 degrees at night.
25.02.2024

The Russians described how to share property in civil marriage.


Russians need proof of cohabitation and the right to own property to separate property in civil marriage, and prevent the Roskaya.
25.02.2024

In Russia, they are testing the delivery of drugs and tests using drones.


In Russia, they are testing the delivery of medicines and analyses by means of drones. This has been reported by the Minister of Health of RF Mikhail Murashko, writing RIA News.
24.02.2024

Weather changes in the near future may not be expected by the penzens


According to the Penzen Hydrometeorological Centre, on Sunday, 25 February, the Penzen Region is expected to have a traditional February weather with a cold night and not too cold.
24.02.2024

Special operation: summary of the second year


On Saturday, 24 February, two years have elapsed since the ad hoc military operation began in Donbase and Ukraine.
24.02.2024

The Izmaylova street movement in Penza was opened before the deadline.


On Saturday, 24 February, work was completed to renovate water networks in the area of the Izmaylov and Antonov streets.
24.02.2024

On 25 February, we'll prepare ears and scatter fish


Today, 25 February, Russia has no holidays. However, on this day, there have been some remarkable events in history that should be remembered.
24.02.2024

Young Penzen teachers want to increase their payments


In the Pennsentiary Region, it is planned to increase the payments to young pedagogical specialists who receive them during the first three years of work.
24.02.2024

Euthanasia was not the best way to combat dog homelessness.


In Russian regions, the authorities have begun to adopt laws on the adoption of homeless animals to protect people. They received this right in the summer of 2023. Laws on " Humane Euthanasia " were adopted in Buryatia, Tuwe, Astrakhan and Madada province, the Republic of Altai, Chukotka and Zabaikalje.
24.02.2024

In a parking lot in Moscow, the roof fell and hit 30 cars.


In Moscow, the roof of the guarded parking lot fell on 30 cars. Telegram-Canal SHOT reports this.
24.02.2024

The doctor pointed to the health damage of some leather.


The vegetation can be dangerous to health under certain conditions, warned the endocrinerologist, Dilar Lebedev. The doctor told him about the harm of certain types of dishes in his Telegram Canal.
24.02.2024

Drivers ' fines on road cameras in Russia have proved record.


The amount of fines issued by cameras for photo-recording to drivers who violated the DPA was record last year over the past five years. This is reported by the TAS with reference to the State Inspectorate ' s data.
24.02.2024

In Krasnoyarsk, the murder of 25 years ago was solved because of a debt of 20,000 roubles.


In Krasnoyarsk, investigators solved a murder that took place 25 years ago. This is reported by RIA News with reference to the Regional Investigations Committee (SAC) Investigations Office statement.
24.02.2024

A soldier was given an armoured armor to a front cat.


Kotu Muhic, who lives with soldiers in the special military operation in Ukraine (SWO), has given a real armoured armour. Telegram-Canal Shot reports.
24.02.2024

64-year-old nipple and six days he refused hospitalization


The resident of the north-east of Moscow was a boiler and refused hospitalization for six days. It was reported by Telegram-Canal Shot.
24.02.2024

In Petersburg, a man with a pregnant wife was delayed due to a fight.


At Pulkovo Pheterburg Airport, the flight was delayed for six hours because of a fight by a man with a pregnant wife. It was reported by Telegram-Canal Shot.
24.02.2024

In Lenin Square in Penza, plants were again killed


In the area of Lenin in Penza, plants planted in the Wazone were again killed. This was reported on Saturday, 24 February, by a resident of the Irina Regional Centre, in the version of the Penzainform network.
24.02.2024

In the Penza region, the Fur Schophere asked colleagues for help.


On the evening of Thursday, 22 February, a report was sent to the duty station of the Russian Ministry of Internal Affairs on the Besson region that the driver of the heavy-duty vehicle was frozen on the 604th kilometre of the Lower Novgorod-Sarat Road.
24.02.2024

A 40-year-old villager was killed by the fire in the Penzen region


On Friday, 23 February, a 40-year-old man died in the village of Porzo-Berezovka Penzen District.
